32 RotationMatrix eul2rot(EulerVector th)
33 {
34  RotationMatrix R;
35  R << cos(th[0]) * cos(th[1]), cos(th[0]) * sin(th[1]) * sin(th[2]) - sin(th[0]) * cos(th[2]), cos(th[0]) * sin(th[1]) * cos(th[2]) + sin(th[0]) * sin(th[2]),
36  sin(th[0]) * cos(th[1]), sin(th[0]) * sin(th[1]) * sin(th[2]) + cos(th[0]) * cos(th[2]), sin(th[0]) * sin(th[1]) * cos(th[2]) - cos(th[0]) * sin(th[2]),
37  -sin(th[1]), cos(th[1]) * sin(th[2]), cos(th[1]) * cos(th[2]);
38 
39  return R;
40 }
41 
49 EulerVector rot2eul(RotationMatrix R)
50 {
51 
52  double x = atan2(R(1, 0), R(1, 1));
53  double y = atan2(-R(2, 0), sqrt(pow(R(2, 1), 2) + pow(R(2, 2), 2)));
54  double z = atan2(R(2, 1), R(2, 2));
55 
56  EulerVector e(x, y, z);
57 
58  return e;
59 }

69 bool check_angles(JointStateVector Th)
70 {
71 
72  int cont = 0;
73 
74  Eigen::Matrix<double, 6, 2> max_angles_value;
75  max_angles_value << -6.14, 6.14,
76  -3.14, 0,
77  -3.14, 3.14,
78  -6.28, 6.28,
79  -6.28, 6.28,
80  -6.28, 6.28;
81 
82  for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
83  {
84 
85  if (Th(i) > max_angles_value(cont, 0) && Th(i) < max_angles_value(cont, 1))
86  {
87  cont = cont + 1;
88  continue;
89  }
90  else
91  {
92  return false;
93  }
94  }
95 
96  return true;
97 }

116 bool check_singularity_collision(const double th1, const double th2, const double th3, const double th4, const double th5, const double th6)
117 {
118 
119  vector<TransformationMatrix> matrici;
120  bool cond = true;
121  float Pos_x, Pos_y, Pos_z;
122  TransformationMatrix Tn;
123 
124  TransformationMatrix T10m = T10f(th1);
125  matrici.push_back(T10m);
126  TransformationMatrix T21m = T21f(th2);
127  matrici.push_back(T21m);
128  TransformationMatrix T32m = T32f(th3);
129  matrici.push_back(T32m);
130  TransformationMatrix T43m = T43f(th4);
131  matrici.push_back(T43m);
132  TransformationMatrix T54m = T54f(th5);
133  matrici.push_back(T54m);
134  TransformationMatrix T65m = T65f(th6);
135  matrici.push_back(T65m);
136 
137  Tn << 1, 0, 0, 0,
138  0, 1, 0, 0,
139  0, 0, 1, 0,
140  0, 0, 0, 1;
141 
142  for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
143  {
144 
145  Tn = Tn * matrici[i];
146  Pos_x = Tn(0, 3);
147  Pos_y = Tn(1, 3);
148  Pos_z = Tn(2, 3);
149 
150  if (Pos_z < 0 or Pos_z > 0.745 + 0.17 or Pos_y > 0.25)
151  {
152  cout << Pos_z << " " << Pos_y << endl;
153  cond = false;
154  break;
155  }
156  }
157  return cond;
158 }
159 
170 JointStateVector nearest(JointStateVector qEs, vector<JointStateVector> configurations)
171 {
172 
173 
174  double min_dist = 100000;
175  int cont = 0;
176  int pos = 0;
177  JointStateVector e;
178  double e_norm;
179  for (JointStateVector conf : configurations)
180  {
181 
182  if (!check_angles(conf))
183  {
184  cont = cont + 1;
185  continue;
186  }
187  if (!check_singularity_collision(conf[0], conf[1], conf[2], conf[3], conf[4], conf[5]))
188  {
189  cont = cont + 1;
190  continue;
191  }
192  e = conf - qEs;
193  e_norm = e.norm();
194  if (e_norm < min_dist)
195  {
196  min_dist = e_norm;
197  pos = cont;
198  }
199  cont = cont + 1;
200  }
201 
202  JointStateVector qEf = configurations[pos];
203 
204  return qEf;
205 }
206 
219 vector<vector<double>> thetaConnect2Points(const double tStart, JointStateVector qEs, JointStateVector qEf, const double dt, const double DtP, const double DtA)
220 {
221  // route contains 6 vectors (pairs) , each of it contains start and end of q of the joint
222  vector<vector<double>> route;
223  vector<double> couple(2);
224  for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
225  {
226  couple.clear();
227  couple.push_back(qEs[i]);
228  couple.push_back(qEf[i]);
229  route.push_back(couple);
230  }
231 
232  // INITIAL ACCELERATION
233  int size = (int)(DtA / dt);
234  vector<double> T;
235  for (double i = 0; i < DtA + dt; i = i + dt)
236  {
237  T.push_back(i);
238  }
239  vector<vector<double>> th;
240 
241  vector<double> last_q(7);
242 
243  vector<double> qp; // t + 6 joint
244  double vdes;
245  double A;
246  double q;
247 
248  for (double t : T)
249  {
250  qp.clear();
251  qp.push_back(t + tStart);
252 
253  for (vector<double> joint : route)
254  {
255  vdes = (DtP / (DtP - DtA)) * (joint[1] - joint[0]) / (DtP);
256  A = vdes / DtA;
257  q = joint[0] + A * (pow(t, 2)) / 2;
258  qp.push_back(q); // I add the positions of all the joints for instant t
259  }
260 
261  th.push_back(qp); // I add the conf of the joints in t
262 
263  last_q = qp;
264  }
265 
266  // I make the uniform motion from DtA , to DtP-DtA
267 
268  size = (int)((DtP - 2 * DtA) / dt);
269  T.resize(size);
270  T.clear();
271  for (double i = DtA + dt; i < (DtP - DtA) + dt; i = i + dt)
272  {
273  T.push_back(i);
274  }
275  int pos;
276  for (double t : T)
277  {
278  qp.clear();
279  qp.push_back(t + tStart);
280  pos = 1;
281 
282  for (vector<double> joint : route)
283  {
284 
285  vdes = (DtP / (DtP - DtA)) * (joint[1] - joint[0]) / (DtP);
286  q = last_q[pos] + vdes * (t - DtA);
287  qp.push_back(q);
288  pos++;
289  }
290  th.push_back(qp);
291  }
292 
293  last_q = qp;
294 
295  // FINAL DECELERATION
296 
297  size = (int)((DtA) / dt);
298  T.resize(size);
299  T.clear();
300  for (double i = DtP - DtA + dt; i <= DtP + dt; i = i + dt)
301  {
302  T.push_back(i);
303  }
304 
305  for (double t : T)
306  {
307  qp.clear();
308  qp.push_back(t + tStart);
309  pos = 1;
310  for (vector<double> joint : route)
311  {
312  vdes = (DtP / (DtP - DtA)) * (joint[1] - joint[0]) / (DtP);
313  A = -vdes / DtA;
314  q = last_q[pos] + vdes * (t - (DtP - DtA)) + A * (pow(t - (DtP - DtA), 2)) / 2;
315  qp.push_back(q);
316  pos = pos + 1;
317  }
318  th.push_back(qp);
319  }
320 
321  return th;
322 }
323 
337 vector<vector<double>> p2pMotionPlanIntermediatePoints(const JointStateVector qEs, const PositionVector xEf, EulerVector phiEf, vector<PositionVector> intermediate_points, double dt ,bool turn)
338 {
339 
340  vector<JointStateVector> qAll;
341  qAll.push_back(qEs);
342 
343  JointStateVector qInt;
344  JointStateVector last_q = qEs;
345  EulerVector e(0, 0, 0);
346 
347  int i = 0;
348  for (PositionVector item : intermediate_points)
349  {
350  // if is a turn movement , the second to last point to reach will have alrady the final configuration phiEf
351  if(i == intermediate_points.size() -1 && turn){
352  item(2) = 0.6;
353  qInt = nearest(last_q, inverse_kinematics(item, eul2rot(phiEf)));
354 
355  }else{
356  qInt = nearest(last_q, inverse_kinematics(item, eul2rot(e)));
357  }
358 
359  if(qInt[0] > M_PI/2){
360  qInt[0] = qInt[0] - 2*M_PI;
361  }
362  qAll.push_back(qInt);
363  last_q = qInt;
364  i++;
365  }
366 
367  // Optimizes excessive gripper rotations
368  if(phiEf(0) > 1.5 * M_PI){
369  phiEf(0) = phiEf(0) - 2*M_PI;
370  }
371  if(phiEf(0) < - 1.5 * M_PI){
372  phiEf(0) = phiEf(0) + 2*M_PI;
373  }
374  // I add final position
375  qInt = nearest(last_q, inverse_kinematics(xEf, eul2rot(phiEf)));
376  if(qInt[0] > M_PI/2){
377  qInt[0] =qInt[0] - 2*M_PI;
378  }
379  qAll.push_back(qInt);
380 
381  vector<vector<double>> th;
382 
383  double DtA = 0.5; // time it takes starting from 0 to reach the final speed, or the other way around
384  double DtP = 2; // time it takes to get from one point to another
385 
386  int size = (int)qAll.size();
387  vector<double> T(size);
388  int incr = 0;
389  iota(T.begin(), T.end(), incr);
390 
391  for (int i : T)
392  {
393 
394  if (i + 1 < size) // I check whether it has a subsequent
395  {
396  vector<vector<double>> res = thetaConnect2Points(i * DtP, qAll[i], qAll[i + 1], dt, DtP, DtA);
397  th.insert(th.end(), res.begin(), res.end());
398  }
399  }
400 
401  return th;
402 }
